com.example.jorden.jorden1_subbook

Class CustomListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter
        • com.example.jorden.jorden1_subbook.CustomListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class CustomListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter
    This class is used to display the list of subscriptions in an easy to read format. The main goal of this class is just to set a custom adapter so that it is easy to display the subscription objects in the main activity.
    See Also:
    Part of this code was adapted from: https://appsandbiscuits.com/listview-tutorial-android-12-ccef4ead27cc accessed on 2/4/2018

        public CustomListAdapter(android.app.Activity context,

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                 android.view.View view,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        This method is used to display the subscriptions properly in the list. It allows the user to quickly see their list of subscriptions
        Specified by:
        getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter
        Parameters:
        position - where an object appears in the list.
        view - this is the view of where the list will be displayed
        parent - the parent of this view
        Returns:
        returns the item from the list in an easy to read format
        See Also:
        MainActivity
